entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is being addressed by Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is known for being strict and having a grudge against Harry.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of Gryffindor house.
